name: TOUCH&GLOW
0:
”Alexa, turn on Office”
”Alexa, turn off kitchen”
”Alexa, set Bedroom to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Using this skill you can remote control Touch&Glow smart lights. This skill allows you to turn on, turn off and dim the Touch&Glow products you own. You need account with Touch&glow to allow your Alexa account access to Touch&Glow devices.
